testimonials.quote: Proper old school tattooing, none of this modern nonsense. My eagle came out perfect, bold lines that'll last forever.
testimonials.author: Mike T.

testimonials.quote: Been getting Japanese work done here for two years now. The attention to detail is incredible, really knows the traditional methods.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

paragraphs: We opened Validate Fix because too many shops were cutting corners. Machine-generated stencils, watered-down inks, rushed work that fades in five years. That's not tattooing – that's just marking skin.

Every piece here is done the right way. Hand-drawn designs, premium pigments, techniques passed down through generations. We specialise in traditional American and authentic Japanese work because these styles have stood the test of time. No trends, no gimmicks – just solid tattoos that'll look as good in twenty years as they do today.
about.callout: If you want fast and cheap, go elsewhere. If you want it done right, you're in the right place.
about.imageAlt: Artist working on traditional tattoo design

items.question: Do you take walk-ins?
items.answer: Yeah, especially for traditional flash pieces. Japanese custom work usually needs booking ahead though. Best to ring or drop by and we'll sort you out.

items.question: How much for a sleeve?
items.answer: Depends what you want really. Traditional sleeve might be £800-1200, Japanese could be more depending on detail. Come in for a chat and we'll give you a proper quote.

items.question: Do you do cover-ups?
items.answer: If it can be covered properly with bold traditional work, then yeah. Won't do a bodge job though – if it needs laser first, I'll tell you straight.

finalCta.headline: Ready for a proper tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: No compromises, no shortcuts – just solid work that lasts
